entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 6.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of light snow late in the evening and after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023
